message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on developing a framework for robots to actively support humans during collaborative tasks. This falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The proposed approach involves using visual images of human actions as a map for recognizing pre-observed actions in a one-shot learning approach. This involves the use of computer vision techniques (cs.CV) and machine learning algorithms (cs.AI, cs.LG). Finally, the paper also discusses the real-time human-robot collaboration, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
